author: Adelaar, Alexander, 2011
notes: The source is a careful reconstruction of (now extinct) Siraya from 17th century translations of St Matthew's gospel and the catechism into Siraya.Adelaar, Alexander. 2011. problems: Gaps in the data because of nature of sources.
